text: Angus MacKay (born 13 March 1946) is a British former auto racing driver. In 1991 he competed in two rounds of the British Touring Car Championship for R&D; Motorsport in a BMW 318is. Official 1991 BTCC standings ==References== ==External links== *Angus MacKay at driver database *Angus MacKay at BTCC Pages Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:British Touring Car Championship drivers
title: Angus MacKay (racing driver)
